scripts.git-tag: PKG_VERSION=$(jq -r ".version" package.json) && test "$(git rev-list -n 1 v${PKG_VERSION} 2> /dev/null)" == "$(git rev-list -n 1 HEAD)" || git tag v${PKG_VERSION}
scripts.postgit-tag: for remote in $(git remote); do git push $remote --tags; done
scripts.produce: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run git-tag && if [[ $(jq -r ".private" package.json) = "false" ]]; then npm publish --tag next; fi
scripts.publish:latest: PKG_VERSION=$(jq -r ".version" package.json) && npm dist-tag add @plokkke/toolbox@${PKG_VERSION} --tag latest
